org.chronos.chronograph.internal.api.index

Interface ChronoGraphIndexManagerInternal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ChronoGraphIndexManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChronoGraphIndexManagerImpl, ThreadedChronoGraphIndexManager

    public interface ChronoGraphIndexManagerInternal
extends ChronoGraphIndexManager
    The internal representation of the ChronoGraphIndexManager with additional methods for internal use.

    • Method Summary

      Adds the given graph index to this manager.

    • Method Detail

      • addIndex

        void addIndex(ChronoGraphIndex index)
        Adds the given graph index to this manager.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to add. Must not be null.

      • findVertexIdsByIndexedProperties

        java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> findVertexIdsByIndexedProperties(java.util.Set<org.chronos.chronodb.internal.api.query.searchspec.SearchSpecification<?>> searchSpecifications)
        Performs an index search for the vertices that meet all of the given search specifications.
        Parameters:
        searchSpecifications - The search specifications to find the matching vertices for. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        An iterator over the IDs of all vertices that fulfill all given search specifications. May be empty, but never null.

      • findEdgeIdsByIndexedProperties

        java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String> findEdgeIdsByIndexedProperties(java.util.Set<org.chronos.chronodb.internal.api.query.searchspec.SearchSpecification<?>> searchSpecifications)
        Performs an index search for the edges that meet all of the given search specifications.
        Parameters:
        searchSpecifications - The search specifications to find the matching edges for. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        An iterator over the IDs of all edges that fulfill all given search specifications. May be empty, but never null.

      • executeOnGraph

        void executeOnGraph(ChronoGraph graph,
                    java.lang.Runnable job)
        Instances of ChronoGraphIndexManager internally hold a reference to their owning ChronoGraph. This method allows to temporarily exchange that reference with the given graph and execute the given job.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to refer to during the execution of the given job. Must not be null.
        job - The job to execute on this manager while it is referring to the given graph. Must not be null.

      • executeOnGraph

        <T> T executeOnGraph(ChronoGraph graph,
                     java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> job)
        Instances of ChronoGraphIndexManager internally hold a reference to their owning ChronoGraph. This method allows to temporarily exchange that reference with the given graph and execute the given job.
        Parameters:
        graph - The graph to refer to during the execution of the given job. Must not be null.
        job - The job to execute on this manager while it is referring to the given graph. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The result of the job.
